quiz.question: What is the term for revenue minus explicit costs?
Which term refers to currency value relative to others?
What term denotes the elasticity of tax revenue to changes in tax rate, often shown on Laffer curve?
Which term defines payments to labor for work?
What term describes demand that increases as income rises more than proportionally?
What term refers to the reduction in costs per unit from technological change separate from scale?
What is the term for costs that do not change with output?
Which term describes a government's reduction in spending or increase in taxes?
Which term describes the value of the next-best forgone alternative in resource allocation?
What is the term for a government tax on imported goods?
Which term describes when inflation and unemployment rise together?
What term describes companies using price cuts to drive competitors out, then raising prices?
Which term means the extra satisfaction from consuming one more unit?
Which term describes the lost welfare when tariffs reduce trade volume?
Which term refers to when short-term nominal wages do not adjust quickly to changes in prices?
